Articles.Content:
So everybody got on my case for having a drop tank. I ditched it and went nuclear. This thing will get you to minmus. Or duna if you are better than me at the game. All info and instructions in the imgur album.

Craft Here: http://d.pr/f/onnh

Javascript is disabled. View full album

http://imgur.com/a/47s0G

Awesome craft. Care to join a building coop to expand upon your ideas? Check out Shuttlecraft Systems in my sig below. In the meantime, I tried dissecting your craft, and realized you have the clamp o tron as the root item? How did you manage that? Is there a computer core hiding in there that I'm not finding?

Since .21 I think you have been able to start with most of the parts. I just do it because I use sub assembly manager, http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/subassembly-manager/ it makes things easier to work with when the pod isn't the 1st part.

I should put a probe body in there though, just so it could fly itself.

Edited August 8, 2013 by Apatheticjester

Looks awesome. Nice naming!No jet fuel that I can see, though, you just take that extra oxidizer as a penalty, right? And don't let people get you down with lipping comments: as long as it looks as good as this, it was for a good cause.

Nice plane! Very impressive.

Also, where do you get that improved starfield (universe backdrop)?

Nice plane! Very impressive.

Also, where do you get that improved starfield (universe backdrop)?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44913-0-21-1-UniverseReplacer-Dreamscape-Skybox-pack

Looks awesome. Nice naming!No jet fuel that I can see, though, you just take that extra oxidizer as a penalty, right? And don't let people get you down with lipping comments: as long as it looks as good as this, it was for a good cause.

Not taking jet fuel is a penalty, until you refuel in orbit, then it's added efficiency. I mostly didn't take it to keep down size, the one thing I won't clip is fuel tanks. I really wish they would add some stock small jet fuel tanks. A small ssto only needs like 60 fuel before you hit the rockets, the mk-1 holds 150. That or oxidizer tanks...but they might add that, it's one of the few things in kspx that hasn't been made stock.

Edited August 8, 2013 by Apatheticjester
